sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-employee', templateUrl: './add-employee.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-employee.component.css'] }) export class AddEmployeeComponent implements OnInit { addEmployee:any=''; constructor(private fb:FormBuilder,private routes:Router,private employeeservice:EmployeeService){ this.addEmployee = fb.group({ fullname:["",Validators.required], age:["",Validators.required], email:["",Validators.required], password:["",Validators.required], }) } ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(){ console.log(this.addEmployee.value); this.employeeservice.addEmployee(this.addEmployee.value).subscribe((data:any)=>{ console.log(data); this.routes.navigate(['/list-employee']); }) } }
